author: National Bureau
text:
Bahujan Samaj Party (BSP) chief Mayawati on Tuesday said the sacrifice of late Kanshi Ram, founder of the BSP, should be respected and he should be given the Bharat Ratna, the country’s highest civilian award.

“Kanshi Ram worked for the uplift of backward and poor people through his entire life and today [Tuesday], being his birthday, I urge the government to pay tributes to him by honouring him with the Bharat Ratna,” Ms. Mayawati said in the Rajya Sabha.
title: Mayawati seeks Bharat Ratna for Kanshi Ram
